"The Time-Traveling Bunny" is a children's book series that follows the adventures of a bunny who has the ability to travel through time. Each book could focus on a different historical era or time period and explore the bunny's experiences and lessons learned.

A virtual reality game where players take on the role of the time-traveling bunny, exploring different eras and completing missions. The game could also include educational content to teach players about history.

A series of short videos or animated clips featuring the time-traveling bunny and their adventures throughout history. These could be shared on social media or used as promotional material for other products.
A line of collectible figurines or toys based on the time-traveling bunny, each featuring a different historical era or time period. These could be marketed as educational toys for children.

A mobile app that allows users to create their own time-traveling bunny adventures. Users could choose different eras and historical events to explore, and create their own missions and challenges to complete. The app could also include educational content to teach users about history.
